alert.note: Alert for Rota (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 16 at 4:00AM ChST until January 19 at 6:00AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph possible. * WHERE...Guam and Rota. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles and along higher terrain. Canopies and other loose structures may be blown away if not fastened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An extensive synoptic low moving off the coast of Japan, in addition to a strong high following closely behind it, will produce a substantially stronger shear line that is expected to bring damaging winds and hazardous seas to the region by Wednesday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
